ch.aplu.android

Interface GGSoftButtonListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GGSoftButtonAdapter

    public interface GGSoftButtonListener
    Declarations of the notifications method called when a soft button is touched.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buttonClicked(int buttonNb)
      Event callback when the button is clicked (pressed and released).
      void buttonPressed(int buttonNb)
      Event callback when the button is pressed.
      void buttonReleased(int buttonNb)
      Event callback when the button is release.
      void buttonRepeated(int buttonNb)
      Event callback when the button is hold down.

    • Method Detail

      • buttonPressed

        void buttonPressed(int buttonNb)
        Event callback when the button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        buttonNb - the number of the button (0..3)

      • buttonReleased

        void buttonReleased(int buttonNb)
        Event callback when the button is release. Happens also if pressed inside and and released outside the button.
        Parameters:
        buttonNb - the number of the button (0..3)

      • buttonRepeated

        void buttonRepeated(int buttonNb)
        Event callback when the button is hold down. The notification is invoked immediately when the button is pressed, then a time of about 0.5 s elapses until the next invocation. Further invocations happens repeatedly with a period of about 0.2 s until the button is released. To avoid concurrency problems, be aware that all invocations are performed by a new separate thread.
        Parameters:
        buttonNb - the number of the button (0..3)

      • buttonClicked

        void buttonClicked(int buttonNb)
        Event callback when the button is clicked (pressed and released).
        Parameters:
        buttonNb - the number of the button (0..3)
